title: LYANER Women's Tie Back Off Shoulder Wrap Layer Ruffle Short Sleeve Mini Dress
description: Fabric: Made of comfortable, super soft, lightweight fabric perfect for relaxed everyday wear. Enjoy comfortable wear throughout the day thanks to the soft material.

Features: Ruched bust, self tie up at back, off shoulder, wrap design, layer ruffle hem mini dress. Classic style with belt in the belly area, easy to show your curve and make you elegant and the mini dress always offers a comfortable fit.

Unique design: This layer ruffle dress is easy to match with nude heels to create a casual everyday look. With a pair of sandals, it is very suitable for walking on the beach, enjoying the sun is bathing, it is very comfortable. Off the shoulder design with exquisite necklace, a combination of fashion and chic. The stylish detail design makes you more attractive in any occasion.

Occasions: Layer ruffle elegant mini dress perfect for both indoor daily wear and outdoor activities like party, beach, club, holiday, casual home wear, etc. Also a great gift for mother, wife, girlfriend, daughter or friend.
Please check the LYANER size chart carefully before placing purchase
